page.title: 09FECKENHAM HORSE SHOW
page.content:
Feckenham holds a Horse show every year, usually on the same day as the Wake.(See previous page).
The show is held on a nearby farm and people come from miles around. It takes a whole year to organise the event as it is so huge. Many local groups(including the First School) receive a donation from the profits.
This year there was a demonstation by the local Hunt. There are events for showjumping and gymkhana, as well as Fancy dress and carting.
Many of the local children have their own ponies, and entered the Gymkhana.There were beer and refreshment tents for tired adults.
